name: Moments in Mia's
description:
At a time when society is still trying to learn how to navigate the ongoing pandemic, a new job at a local store brings an opportunity to learn more about the small community surrounding it. You, the player, will be able to discover the stories of your customers and coworker as you stock shelves and sell items. From dealing with loss to navigating life's purpose, you have the chance to guide people through the perils that they face, often just by lending a helpful ear.

All just in a few moments in Mia's.

Content Warnings Include: Mentions of Sexual Assault, Police Brutality, Death, COVID-19, Cigarette and Alcohol Use, Depression & Suicidal Tendencies

  • Four stories to follow from four different characters
    • Four hidden endings which you can unlock
